ygData.subject: RE: see invis? I don't see it......
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Word I m getting (indirectly) is that the latest enchanter strategy on Vox runs is to stamina drain her so she can t get as many complete heals off.  Vox
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, 5 Feb 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> lol i thought that was funny too. use a song that barely affects another
> player on a dragon? and this guy is in control of every spell/song in the
> game =/ i am really looking forward to our new songs when they come out.

Word I'm getting (indirectly) is that the latest enchanter
strategy on Vox runs is to stamina drain her so she can't get
as many complete heals off. Vox (and probably Naggy) were
changed so that they can't be stunned/bashed/mesmerized to
interrupt their casting anymore.

Dunno how our song compares to their spell, or even if it
stacks.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
